data.question: What is the formula for organozinc pivalate reagents mentioned in the text?
What property of organozinc pivalate reagents makes them stand out among salt-supported organometallic reagents?
data.answer: They show more resistance to attack by moist air than conventional organometallic compounds.

data.question: True or False: The presence of Mg(OPiv)2 enhances the air stability of aryl zinc species by sequestering H2O contaminants.
What does the molecular structure of [(THF)2Li2(Cl)2(OPiv)2Zn] suggest about the role of LiCl in the multicomponent mixtures?
data.answer: It provides insight into the role of LiCl in these mixtures.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of organozinc pivalate reagents involves a transmetallation step with zinc pivalate.
What was the outcome of air exposure tests on the arylzinc reagent in solution form without Mg(OPiv)2?
data.answer: 90% survived with only 10% hydrolyzed to toluene.

data.question: True or False: The reaction mixture of Me(p-C6H4)MgCl and Zn(OPiv)2·n LiCl in the negative-ion mode identified various zincate species largely depleted in pivalate ligands.
What does the presence of OH- or O2- ions in the crystal structure of [{Mg6(OPiv)12}(MgO)2]·C7H8 indicate?
data.answer: It indicates contamination by these ions.

data.question: True or False: Mg(OPiv)2 acts as a decontaminating agent by mopping up OH- or O2- ions.
What was the effect of LiCl on the solubility of Zn(OPiv)2 in THF?
data.answer: LiCl made Zn(OPiv)2 soluble in THF by forming a molecular complex.

data.question: True or False: The addition of Mg(OPiv)2 to the arylzinc reagent in solution form increased its air stability to 95%.
What was the survival rate of Bu2Zn·2 LiCl in THF solution upon adding 5 equivalents of Mg(OPiv)2?
True or False: The experiments suggest that Mg(OPiv)2 can protect organozinc compounds from air by capturing and holding on to H2O molecules.
What was the yield of the biaryl product from reactions of ethyl 4-iodobenzoate with different zinc reagents under identical conditions?
data.answer: The yield was in a narrow range of high yields.

data.question: True or False: The presence of Mg(OPiv)2 had no appreciable effect on the Negishi cross-coupling capability of the Me(p-C6H4)ZnX reagent.
What was the effect of air on the cross-coupling reactions performed in non-dried glassware for pivalate-free reagents?
data.answer: The yield dropped slightly for pivalate-free reactions when performed in air.

data.question: True or False: The reaction of Bu2Mg and Zn(OPiv)2 with added LiCl in THF solution followed a similar complete transmetalation course to that of its aryl analogue.
What was the outcome when the reaction mixture of Me(p-C6H4)MgCl and Zn(OPiv)2·n LiCl was analyzed in the positive-ion mode ESI?
data.answer: Pivalate-rich species were detected, and the most abundant cations observed also contained an OH group.

data.question: True or False: The experiments showed that Mg(OPiv)2 can mop up OH- and O2- ions in contaminated solutions.
What was the effect of adding TMEDA to the original reaction mixture on the unit cell checks of crystals?
data.answer: It confirmed that complete transmetalation to Me(p-C6H4)ZnCl had occurred and that the latter was not interacting with Mg(OPiv)2 co-product but segregated from it.
